Synopsis
David is a computer expert can bypass the most advanced security systems and to decipher the most secretive secret codes. But his game is complicated when involuntarily connects your computer to the US Department of Defense, in charge of the nuclear defense. And triggered a dangerous situation difficult to control. With the help of his girlfriend and another great computer will attempt, in a race against time, avoiding World War III.

Somehow, those born or raised in the 80s, this film, the hypothesis posed, or Matthew Broderick's character has become somewhat popular in the collective imagination. Who did not dream, in those years, with handle master this very mysterious thing then it was the computer (while playing the Martians those antediluvian Amstrad CPC 6128 or Spectrum Sinclair), use it to change the class notes, power speaking from a phone booth with a veneer of coke of old (I swear I try to do the same as a kid), access to NASA to put everything upside down, away from the police while investigating a mystery, and incidentally be the girl while you wanderest a little game in recreational neighborhood.
